shortdesc.ph: Metric information during video frame rendering.

plentry.pd: The time interval from when the method is called until the callback is triggerred. The unit is milliseconds.
The time interval from calling to calling . The unit is milliseconds. A negative number means to call after calling .
Time interval from calling to successfully joining the channel. The unit is milliseconds.

ul.li: If the local user calls before successfully joining the channel, this value is the time interval from the local user successfully joining the channel to the remote user joining the channel. The unit is milliseconds.
If the local user calls after successfully joining the channel, the value is the time interval from calling to when the remote user joins the channel. The unit is milliseconds.

pd.note: 如果本地用户在远端用户加入频道后调用 ，则该值为 0，无参考意义。

ul.li: If the local user calls before the remote user joins the channel, this value is the time interval from when the remote user joins the channel to when the local user sets the remote view. The unit is milliseconds.
If the local user calls after the remote user joins the channel, this value is the time interval from calling to setting the remote view. The unit is milliseconds.
如果本地用户在设置远端视图后再调用 ，则该值为 0，无参考意义。

It is recommended to set the remote view before the remote user joins the channel, or set the remote view immediately after the remote user joins the channel, so as to reduce the value of this parameter and improve the speed of the remote user's drawing.

If the local user calls before the remote user joins the channel, this value is the time interval from the remote user joining the channel to subscribing to the remote video stream. The unit is milliseconds.
If the local user calls after the remote user joins the channel, this value is the time interval from calling to subscribing to the remote video stream. The unit is milliseconds.

pd.note: 如果在订阅远端视频流后再调用 ，则该值为 0，无参考意义。

ul.li: If the local user calls before the remote user joins the channel, this value is the time interval from when the remote user joins the channel to when the local user receives the remote video stream. The unit is milliseconds.
If the local user calls after the remote user joins the channel, this value is the time interval from calling to receiving the remote video stream. The unit is milliseconds.

pd.note: 如果在接收到远端视频流后再调用 ，则该值为 0，无参考意义。
